channel.title: ------login and dc on everyclient-----
channel.description: Im using stingazz source and every client u try to login with u can like see the invy and stuff then dc. I know this problem is server sided so the coder of the source had so you could only login from 1 client but how do i change?

item.title: ------login and dc on everyclient-----
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“Kayceee, post:2, topic:328944”]This is either because you have got some sort of Custom Item on your account that the client cannot load so it just kicks you and logs out.
Because you are nulled or because your source has something set so that you can only use a certain client.
I wouldn’t know how to change it so you can use any client because I’ve never done it. But I’m sure there is a guide on how to make your server only useable from one client, so I’d just check that out but do it in reverse.

Hope this helped :|[/quote]

its not nulling from an object cause even with new accs it does this

Read full topic

item.title: ------login and dc on everyclient-----
item.dc:creator: @Kayceee Kayceee
item.description:
@Kayceee wrote:

This is either because you have got some sort of Custom Item on your account that the client cannot load so it just kicks you and logs out.
Because you are nulled or because your source has something set so that you can only use a certain client.
I wouldn’t know how to change it so you can use any client because I’ve never done it. But I’m sure there is a guide on how to make your server only useable from one client, so I’d just check that out but do it in reverse.

Hope this helped

Read full topic
